tuv.seg: Leaving Certificate examination fees
Táillí scrúdaithe na hArdteistiméireachta
• Where to apply Information
• Cá háit a ndéanfaidh mé iarratas
If you are taking the Leaving Certificate in a school setting, your school will give you a form
Ní mór do dhaltaí atá ag déanamh nó ag athdhéanamh na hArdteistiméireachta táillí a íoc le go bhféadfaidís na scrúduithe a dhéanamh
You make the payment through a bank and the bank must stamp the form. You then return the form to the school
Má tá cárta leighis agat féin nó ag do thuismitheoir nó do chaomhnóir, tá tú díolmhaithe ó na táillí sin
If you, your parent(s) or guardian(s) hold a current medical card you do not have to pay the fee
Ní gá do dhalta a bhfuil cárta leighis reatha ag a thuismitheoir nó ag a chaomhnóir an táille a íoc
Put the details of the medical card on the fee payment form and return the form to the school
Sa chás seo, cuirtear sonraí an chárta leighis ar an bhfoirm íocaíochta táille, agus is ansin a sheolann an tuismitheoir an fhoirm ar ais chuig an scoil

If you are an external student (that is, you are sitting your examinations outside of a school setting), you can either apply and pay online or get a form from the Entries section of the State Examinations Commission (see 'Where to apply') and pay through a bank

Más dalta seachtrach tú (is é sin, nach bhfuil tú ag déanamh do chuid scrúduithe laistigh de scoil éigin), is féidir leat iarratas agus íocaíocht ar líne a dhéanamh nó dul i dteagmháil le Rannóg Iontrálacha Choimisiún na Scrúduithe Stáit
For external students the fee is due to be paid by 8 February 2017
Ní mór an táille don bhliain 2017 a bheith íoctha ar nó roimh 8 Feabhra 2017

If you have not paid your exam fees on time, you can still pay but you will be charged an extra fee per subject (currently €32 per subject for applications received between 9 February and 28 February 2017 inclusive)

Mura raibh do tháillí scrúduithe íoctha in am agat, b'fhéidir leat iad a íoc tar éis 8 Feabhra, ach bheadh táille bhreise le híoc ar gach ábhar agat (faoi láthair €32 ar gach ábhar i gcomhair iarratais faighte idir 9 Feabhra agus 28 Feabhra 2017, araon san áireamh)
A second late fee of €52 per subject in addition to the normal fee will apply to applications made from 1 March to 29 April 2017
Ní ghlactar iarratais ó 1 Márta 2017 ach amháin in imthosca eisceachtúla
Entries for subjects with a practical, oral or project component will not be accepted at this stage
Tá dara táille dhéanach de €52 ar gach ábhar de bhreis ar an gnáththáille le híoc
External candidates who hold a current medical card do not have to pay the fee but are still liable for late fees if they apply after the deadline

Ní gá do dhalta seachtrach a bhfuil cárta leighis reatha aige/aici an táille a íoc. Sa chás go bhfuil díolúine agat ó tháillí, tá táillí deireanacha fós le híoc agat má dhéanann tú d'iarratas tar éis an spriocdháta
School-based students sitting the Leaving Certificate examination for the first time in 2017 must pay a fee of €116
Ní mór do dhaltaí atá ag freastal ar scoil éigin agus atá ag déanamh scrúduithe Ardteistiméireachta den chéad uair i 2017 táille de €116 a íoc
External candidates sitting the exam for the first time pay a fee of €71 for one or two subjects and €116 for 3 or more subjects
Íocann iarrthóirí seachtracha atá ag déanamh an scrúdaithe den chéad uair táille de €71 i gcomhair ábhar amháin nó dhá ábhar agus €116 i gcomhair trí ábhar nó níos mó
If your parents or guardian hold a current medical card, you do not have to pay the fee
Má tá cárta leighis reatha ag do thuismitheoirí nó do chaomhnóir, ní gá duit an táille a íoc
External candidates repeating the Leaving Certificate in 2017 pay fees on a sliding scale as follows: No. of Subjects Fees per subject 1 subject €116 2 subjects €211 3 or more €326
Ní mór do dhaltaí atá ag freastal ar scoil agus atá ag athdhéanamh na hArdteistiméireachta táille de €301 a íoc
